capabilities.name: Data Labelling / Annotation
capabilities.description: Human-in-the-loop tools to tag data (text/images/tables) with QA workflows. Processes and tools to annotate raw data so supervised models can learn from it. Quality labels improve model accuracy and reduce bias.

capabilities.name: Datasets Catalog
capabilities.description: Central registry for datasets with ownership, quality, and access policies. Catalog for discovering datasets, owners, and metadata. Improves findability and governance for analytics and ML.

capabilities.name: Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA)
capabilities.description: Reproducible profiling/visualization to validate data quality and patterns. Statistical profiling and visualization to understand data distributions and quality. Guides feature engineering and model selection.

capabilities.name: Feature Store
capabilities.description: Reusable feature definitions with online/offline serving and lineage. Central platform to register, compute, and serve features consistently for training and inference. Enables reuse and governance of features.

capabilities.name: Batch Inference
capabilities.description: Scheduled/triggered scoring on large datasets. Scheduled scoring of large datasets for offline use cases. Integrates with data lake workflows and orchestration.

capabilities.name: Online Inference
capabilities.description: Low-latency API serving for models. Low-latency model serving via APIs for realtime predictions. Requires autoscaling, monitoring, and rollback.

capabilities.name: Model Store
capabilities.description: Versioned model artifacts with lineage and signatures. Registry for model versions, artifacts, and lineage. Enables promotion across environments with governance.

capabilities.name: SDK / Templates / Blueprints
capabilities.description: Opinionated scaffolds/CLI to create and deploy quickly. Reusable code, templates, and scaffolding for common ML patterns. Reduces boilerplate and enforces best practices.
